name: Holiday Inn Express Kelowna

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is conviniently situated right on the main drag of town. My wife and I stayed for two nights with no problems to report. The room was clean and tidy, with everything in working order. We got an accessible room, so there was a lot of space. The continental breakfast included was the best I've seen and tasted.
reviews.title: Pleasent Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2004, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was the first Holiday Inn Express that we have ever stayed in, and we found it a very comfortableplace to stay when we were away from home. The staff were very nice, and the rooms were very clean, and very suitable for any sort of family who stayed there.
reviews.title: Great Stay

likes.liked: — Close proximity to alot of the places that we needed to go to.

reviews.title: Good Stay
reviews.text: The visit that we had here was so wonderful, that it made our decision easy for a few of the other trips.
I enjoyed my five day stay at the hotel. No problems encountered. Staff were nice, room was clean and amenties all walking distance. I recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: An outstanding Holiday Inn Express

reviews.text: The Okanagan valley is an excellent area to visit whether it is skiing in the winter or enjoying water activities and visiting wineries in the summer. There are several hotels and resorts that cater to individuals on vacation. However, if you are going to Kelowna on business, you will find few hotels that have all of the amenities (i.e. high speed internet service, business office, etc.). The Holiday Inn Express in Kelowna is the best of both worlds.
reviews.title: Great Value at Holiday Inn Express
Enjoyed Our Stay - Recommend it
reviews.text: We recently spent two very enjoyable days at the Holiday Inn Express in Kelowna. We found the room to be very clean and well-maintained. The halls and public areas of the hotel were also very clean - a sign of conscientious staff who take pride in their work. We didn't use the pool, but it seemed to be a bright, cheerful, and inviting area. The desk staff were all exceptionally pleasant and helpful. Although they do allow pets (a negative from our point of view) they try to restrict pets to the first floor. That means those of us who have allergies and don't relish being in a room that has had pets in it, can ask for a room on the higher floors with some expectation of avoiding a problem.

Visited Kelowna from Winnipeg for a 5-day long weekend at the beginning of January. Stayed at the Holiday Inn Express on Hwy 97 North, which is the main road that goes through Kelowna and the Okanogan Valley.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Good Location
Excellent Hotel and Staff in Kelowna
reviews.text: Room – very clean, lot’s of room, had all of the amenities including a mini fridge. Modern furnishings.

reviews.title: Great Place to Stay
reviews.text: Pool – decent indoor pool area with a hot tub.

description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Kelowna HotelOur downtown Kelowna hotel, conveniently located on Highway 97, is located in the heart of Kelowna but still close to championship golf courses, world-class wineries as well as great shopping.Business travelers will certainly appreciate the hotel's proximity to the Kelowna International Airport. Kelowna is home to many championship golf courses including Gallagher's Canyon, Predator Ridge and the Harvest Golf Club. Our hotel in Kelowna has an assortment of amenities for the business traveler, including free high-speed Internet access, a business centre and a meeting room that's ideal for up to 35 people.We provide guests who are looking for comfort and value with the smart choice for lodging. Vacationers to Kelowna will find that we offer excellent packages to both Big White and Silver Star Mountain ski resorts. The Okanagan Valley's wineries host spring and fall wine festivals that are always popular. Guests will be able to wash away their worries as they walk along Okanagan Lake or through one of the many orchards. Our hotel is the perfect leisure vacation choice.With 120 guest rooms, including executive king rooms and two Jacuzzi suites, there are plenty of options for our patrons to choose from when staying in our hotel. Kelowna is a great travel destination for anyone looking for natural beauty in a relaxing environment that is perfect for business or leisure.
